trans-unit.source: Creates and deletes Internet Information Services (IIS) 6.0 virtual roots.
trans-unit.target: 만들고 인터넷 정보 서비스 (IIS) 6.0 가상 루트를 삭제 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapIISVRoot> interface defines methods for creating and deleting virtual roots in IIS 6.0.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapIISVRoot>인터페이스 만들고 IIS 6.0에서 가상 루트를 삭제 하기 위한 메서드를 정의 합니다.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapIISVRoot>

trans-unit.source: This interface is implemented only by the IISVirtualRoot class and is used only within the .NET Framework infrastructure while creating a SOAP-enabled COM+ application virtual root.
trans-unit.target: 이 인터페이스만 IISVirtualRoot 클래스에 의해 구현 되 고 SOAP 기반 COM + 응용 프로그램 가상 루트를 만드는 동안.NET Framework 인프라 내 에서만 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapIISVRoot> does not need to be implemented directly in your code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapIISVRoot>코드에서 직접 구현할 필요가 없습니다.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapIISVRoot>

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish> class, which implements the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher> interface that contains the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.CreateVirtualRoot%2A> and <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 대신를 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>클래스를 구현 하는 <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher>인터페이스를 포함 하는 <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.CreateVirtualRoot%2A>및 <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A>메서드.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.CreateVirtualRoot%2A> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>

trans-unit.source: However, <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A> is not fully implemented by <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>.
trans-unit.target: 그러나 <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A>가 완전히 구현 되지 않은 <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish>.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: IISVirtualRoot is used internally by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: IISVirtualRoot은.NET Framework에서 내부적으로 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: You do not need to use it directly in your code.
trans-unit.target: 코드에서 직접 사용할 필요가 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IISVirtualRoot"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IISVirtualRoot"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates an Internet Information Services (IIS) virtual root.
trans-unit.target: 인터넷 정보 서비스 (IIS) 가상 루트를 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: You do not need to call the Create method from your code.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 코드에서 Create 메서드를 호출할 필요가 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.CreateVirtualRoot%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 대신를 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.CreateVirtualRoot%2A>메서드.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.CreateVirtualRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string with the value `"IIS://localhost/W3SVC/1/ROOT"` representing the root Web server.
trans-unit.target: 값을 갖는 문자열 `"IIS://localhost/W3SVC/1/ROOT"` 루트 웹 서버를 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: The physical path of the virtual root, which corresponds to `PhysicalPath` from the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.CreateVirtualRoot*> method.
trans-unit.target: 에 해당 하는 가상 루트의 실제 경로 `PhysicalPath` 에서 <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.CreateVirtualRoot*>메서드.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.CreateVirtualRoot*>

trans-unit.source: The name of the virtual root, which corresponds to `VirtualRoot` from <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.CreateVirtualRoot*>.
trans-unit.target: 이름에 해당 하는 가상 루트의 `VirtualRoot` <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.CreateVirtualRoot*>.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.CreateVirtualRoot*>

trans-unit.source: A string to which an error message can be written.
trans-unit.target: 오류 메시지를 작성할 수 있는 문자열입니다.

trans-unit.source: Deletes an Internet Information Services (IIS) virtual root.
trans-unit.target: 인터넷 정보 서비스 (IIS) 가상 루트를 삭제합니다.

trans-unit.source: Even though it is public, the Delete method is not intended to be called directly.
trans-unit.target: Public 인 경우에 Delete 메서드를 직접 호출할 수 없습니다 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, there is the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 대신는 <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A>메서드.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.Publish.DeleteVirtualRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, this method is not fully implemented.
trans-unit.target: 그러나이 메서드는 완전 하 게 구현 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: The root Web server, as specified by `RootWebServer` from the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot*> method.
trans-unit.target: 루트 웹 서버에 지정 된 대로 `RootWebServer` 에서 <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot*>메서드.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Internal.IComSoapPublisher.DeleteVirtualRoot*>

trans-unit.source: The physical path of the virtual root.
trans-unit.target: 가상 루트의 실제 경로입니다.

trans-unit.source: The name of the virtual root.
trans-unit.target: 가상 루트의 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: A string to which an error message can be written.
trans-unit.target: 오류 메시지를 작성할 수 있는 문자열입니다.
